author: fitz
msg: Quick fleshing out of 'checkout'. Ben, please review and comment.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: More work on svn-config (Issue #751).
* Makefile.in: Add SVN_APR_INCLUDES and SVN_APRUTIL_INCLUDES to INCLUDES.
* ac-helpers/aprutil.m4: Do not add APR-util's includes to SVN_EXTRA_INCLUDES,
but add to SVN_APRUTIL_INCLUDES.  Store apu-config's --link-ld information
in SVN_APRUTIL_EXPORT_LIBS so that we can print it in svn-config.  Export
SVN_APRUTIL_INCLUDES and SVN_APRUTIL_EXPORT_LIBS.
* ac-helpers/apr.m4: Do not add APR's dependent libraries to LIBS, but rather
to SVN_APR_LIBS (makes consistent with aprutil.m4).  Do not add APR's
includes to SVN_EXTRA_INCLUDES, but add to SVN_APR_INCLUDES.  Store
apr-config's --link-ld information in SVN_APR_EXPORT_LIBS so that we can
print it in svn-config.  Export SVN_APR_INCLUDES and SVN_APR_EXPORT_LIBS.
* svn-config.in: Use SVN_APR{UTIL}_EXPORT_LIBS as we must print the old style
link info not libtool link info.  Add SVN_APR{UTIL}_INCLUDES to INCLUDES.
Add --cflags and --cppflags options.  Note --link-ld and --link-libtool
options that are not implemented yet.

author: fitz
msg: * doc/handbook/client.texi: New file (outline only)
* doc/handbook/repos_admin.texi: Fixes to silence makeinfo
* doc/handbook/svn-handbook.texi: Add Client Cookbook

author: cmpilato
msg: I should be giving (and should *have* been giving) Bill Tutt
<billtut@microsoft.com> all the credit for these recent (and
not-so-recent) modifications to merge() and friends.  Sorry, Bill.
Patch by: Bill Tutt <billtut@microsoft.com>
* subversion/libsvn_fs/tree.c
(update_ancestry): was maybe_update_ancestry().
(merge, txn_body_merge): maybe_update_ancestry => update_ancestry.

author: philip
msg: * subversion/clients/cmdline/util.c (svn_cl__make_log_msg_baton): Always
initialise message_encoding.
